Service Details: - Operates a local, non-denominational social enterprise, offering various Community Assistance Programs and Transition to Employment Programs funded through our thrift store sales- Provides clothing and household necessities to people at very low cost or in exchange for volunteer work hours- Provides goods at no cost to those referred to us by our partner social agencies- Works closely with organizations that address the needs of the homeless- Supports individuals with diverse abilities who wish to be more involved in the community or are seeking to transition into employment- Relies heavily on the generosity of our community for donation, without which our programs would be possible- Provides pick-up and delivery of larger items in the community on a weekly basis- Relies on the good-will of volunteers to keep our prices low- Accepts donations of mattresses & box springsChristmas Hamper Adopt a Family Program:- Through this program families in need are provided with a Hamper filled with food, necessities and small gifts- With the help of local businesses and sponsor families over the past 20 years, over 2000 families have been presented with a Christmas Hamper- If you would like to help in the preparation of christmas hampers or donate to the program please email Adrianne at adoptafamilyshare@gmail.com
Address & Map: 581 Gaston AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 7E6View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: Gaston Ave and St Paul St
